game.name: MOMO.EXE 2
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You have to make a deal with Momo to do the work for the boss. What will Momo ask in return?
game.shortDescriptionEn: You have to make a deal with Momo to do the work for the boss. What will Momo ask in return?

reviewHighlights.text: PLEAAAAAAAASE Play this game this was so fun :D
Momo.EXE 2 is a critique of capitalism, and that you can never be free from a 'boss' in the capitalistic system. In the beginning sequence, you comple...
